topics.body:
And now for you daily political news and a update on the 2014 elections:
It's getting overblown again.  Short version of the latest polls shows that democrats will lose probably four seats but maintain the senate.  It may be split even between democrats and republicans but it's pretty laughable how the republican party is talking about how they're supposedly going to gain a super majority in the senate.

Tl:dr; 2014 election: the status quo is going to be maintained.
